channel.title: [PI] Looking for a coding partner
channel.description:
Looking for a coding partner on my 317 PI server, started it last night, about 5 players this morning and through out the day. We have a .com domain and a 2GB RAM VPS. I am looking for someone who can help me provide daily updates, I am experienced, I've been coding for years, and would like to work with someone with a good amount of experience too.
What I'm looking for: -Someone who can spend alot of time with our server, not just coding 24/7, but also interacting with our community so that our players have fun and can enjoy the server. -Someone that is experienced, who knows what they are doing on a 317 PI server. -Someone who is mature, can be funny and joke around but not to a level that will cause players to leave. -Must be able to code on our vps.
Form: [code]How much time can you comit? Experience with coding (years)? Experience with 317 PI (explain)? Skype: Previous works? [/code]

item.title: [PI] Looking for a coding partner
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

[quote=“hottys2good4, post:5, topic:463270”]"
Rune-World Release - All 24 Skills Trainable - Custom Minigames - NO ANTI-LEECH
« on: June 26, 2012, 09:59:10 AM »
QuoteModifyRemove
Package Link (Source and Client): http://2dl.us/noantileech
Cache Re Uploaded: http://2dl.us/RWCache

I have decided to host this again, if you want to visit heres the link: www.Rage-Scape.com/play/
NO MORE ANTI LEECH!!

Some Features:

Skills:
Perfect combat
All 24 skills are fully trainable, even farming, construction, etc
Skilling arena to help you level up
Ancient and lunar magic
Ancient curses, so you can use that amazing turmoil
100% working range and magic
Great leveling up
Double XP events
Real pking and drops, just like Runescape!

Minigames:
Zombies (NEW)
Pyramid Plunder
Domination Tower
Barrows
Pest Control
Duel Arena
Castle Wars
Tzhaar Fight Caves
Tzhaar Fight Pits
Barbarian Assault
Warrior’s Guild

Monsters:
Frost Dragons
Complete GWD, with all 4 gods
Giant Mole, with real burrowing
Strykywerms
Tormented Demons
Kalphite Queen
KBD
Daggonoth Kings
Chaos Elemental
Everlasting
Nomad
Corporal Beast
Dungeoneering Monsters
Complete Brimhaven Dungeon
Complete Taverly Dungeon
Complete Slayer Tower
Complete Varrock Sewers
100+ Other Spawned NPC’s to be trained on.

Items:
ALL Chaotic Weapons
Extreme Potions
Royal
Torva
Dicing and Gambling
Few Customs
Dragon Claws
Koraski
Ceremonial
Colored Whips
Many, many new Runescape items."

Pics cba[/quote]
Why would we care about an anti-leech if we’re using your user client not the source LMAO?
